title: The Warren G Episode
itunes:title: The Warren G Episode
description:
In this episode we had the opportunity to sit down with the legendary Warren G. We discussed his past and his present, as well as his new BBQ business. This is one for the ages. Due to CV19 we haven't been in studio, so the sound is not the best but just know we are doing what we have to do to provide you with this content that we hope you enjoy. For exclusive episodes of The Gangster Chronicles and other shows not found anywhere else join our premium YouTube channel by clicking here TGC is sponsor supported and the biggest way you can help the show and yourself is by supporting our sponsors. Our friend Ray Jhas a company he co-foundedRaycon that makes really dope earbuds. The quality is better than beats and they are a fraction of the cost. Visit our link to save an additional 15% on the already low price http://BUYRAYCON.com/TGC101 See omnystudio.com/policies/listener for privacy information.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
